### 2011

- 4th September 2011 - [0.9.1](http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/0-9-1-bugfix-release) bugfix release.
- 1st September 2011 - [OSX Builds](http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/osx-builds-back-on-track) back on Track!
- 1st September 2011 - [Summary](http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/august-2011-tournament-summary) of the August 2011 tournament.
- 19th August 2011 - [WebTiles](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/webtiles-at-0-9-finally) has been updated to Crawl v0.9.
- 15th August 2011 - [Crawl 0.9: Victory Valedictory has been released!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/crawl-0-9-victory-valedictory) Big skill training changes.
- 13th August 2011 - The official tournament has started! It ends on August 29, 2011 at midnight UTC. Check [this page](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney11/index.html) for more information.
- 13th May 2011 - The Tiles version of Dungeon Crawl can now be played in your Internet browser! See [Web Tiles](/Web_Tiles "Web Tiles").
- 12th May 2011 - An (un)official [Crawl 0.8 Tournament](/Tournament "Tournament") starts on May 14th to celebrate the release of v0.8! Plays until May 30, 2011 at midnight UTC.
- 27th April 2011 - [Dungeon Crawl 0.8 has been released, with felids!](http://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/faster-pussycats-kill-kill)

### 2010

- 16th December 2010 - [The Dungeon Crawl forum is now hosted on CDO.](https://crawl.develz.org/tavern/)
- 24th November 2010 - [New Dungeon Crawl forum!](http://dungeoncrawlstonesoup.freeforums.org/)
- 24th July 2010 - [The tournament is a week away!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/tourney-time-again)
- 24th July 2010 - [Stone Soup 0.7.0 is finished, with elephants!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/stone-soup-0-7-0-pacific-pachyderm)
- 21st July 2010 - [A third release candidate for 0.7 is out.](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/rc3-for-0-7-0)

- 9th June 2010 - [NetTiles (Windows)](http://www.mediafire.com/?zmyzge3o2wd) - Play online with the tiles interface! Credit goes to Gorilla Codpiece for the link.
- 7th May 2010 - Luca Barbieri has announced **NetTiles**, a branch of 0.6 tiles that allows for play on [CAO](/CAO "CAO"). Check out [this thread](http://sourceforge.net/mailarchive/forum.php?thread_name=q2rff13bc9a1005080027n8ce47dfdw1b532430464ccbfe%40mail.gmail.com\&forum_name=crawl-ref-discuss) on crawl-ref-discuss.
- 27th March 2010 - [Stone Soup 0.6.0 has been released!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/stone-soup-0-6-0-heizolruckstosabdampfung)
- 17th March 2010 - The second release candidate of 0.6 is out. Windows version can be downloaded [here](https://crawl.develz.org/trunk/) and the Mac tiles version can be downloaded [here](https://crawl.develz.org/trunk/crawl_tiles_osx-0.6.0-rc3.zip).
- 15th March 2010 - 0.6's release was delayed due to various bugs that needed to be fixed.
- 3rd March 2010 - [Dungeon Sprint](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/dungeon-sprint-fast-and-furious), a single, fixed level of Dungeon Crawl that is similar to the Tomb of Horrors, is available to play online at crawl.develz.org!
- 1st March 2010 - The released date of 0.6 has been changed to March 15th.
- 24th February 2010 - The 0.6 release is close! The pre-release of 0.6 can be downloaded [here](http://crawl.develz.org/trunk/).
- 3rd February 2010 - 0.6's release date is March 1st! We are keeping track of the changes and you can read them [here](/0.6.0 "0.6.0")!
- 15th January 2010 - Henzell & Gretell can now be accessed [here](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?page_id=214)
- 10th January 2010 - [Playtesting: New changes](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=210)
- 1st January 2010 - Happy New Year! A new version of the [trunk build](http://crawl.develz.org/trunk) is out.

### 2009

- 25th November 2009 - [Playtesting – How you can help!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=116)
- 15th October 2009 - *Crawl* switched to [git](http://git-scm.com/)
- 13th October 2009 - [CAO](/CAO "CAO") upgraded to 0.5.2
- 9th October 2009 - *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup* [0.5.2](http://crawl-ref.sourceforge.net/) is released!
- 19th September 2009 - The [poll results](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/poll_results.txt) are now available.
- 18th September 2009 - [Happy Birthday, Stone Soup!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=50)
- 2nd September 2009 - The [tournament](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney09/overview.html) is over! Read the detailed writeup [here](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney-09-writeup.txt).
- 21th August 2009 - The [devteam](/Devteam "Devteam") would love it if you emailed them answers to this [poll](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/poll.txt).
- 30th July 2009 - [Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup 0.5.1 released!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=79)
- 28th July 2009 - [CAO](/CAO "CAO") '09 tournament is almost upon us! Read about the awards you can win behind [this link](http://crawl.akrasiac.org/tourney09/).
- 16th June 2009 - You can now follow [CAO](/CAO "CAO") as [@crawlakrasiac](http://twitter.com/crawlakrasiac/) on Twitter, if you are so inclined.
- 10th April 2009 - 0.1 version of [Zot Defense](https://sites.google.com/site/crawlvariations/Home) now playable.
- 12th June 2009 - [Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup 0.5 released!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=46)

### 2008

- 15th July 2008 - [Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup 0.4 released!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=37)
- 2nd April 2008 - [Windows binaries of latest trunk available for *Dungeon Crawl Stone Soup v0.4.*](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=33)

### 2007

- 25th September 2007 - [New crawling Server up and running!](https://crawl.develz.org/wordpress/?p=26)
